A.q: Starts with A: Country in South America whose capital is Buenos Aires.

B.q: Starts with B: Hot drink made from roasted beans.

C.q: Starts with C: Natural satellite of the Earth.

D.q: Starts with D: Day that comes after Monday.

E.q: Starts with E: Part of a letter where the recipient's name is written.

F.q: Starts with F: Animal known for its cunning in fables.

G.q: Starts with G: Science that studies the Earth.

H.q: Starts with H: Object used to hang clothes.

I.q: Starts with I: Opposite of exterior.

J.q: Starts with J: Person who delivers justice in a court.

K.q: Starts with K: Martial art from Okinawa.

L.q: Starts with L: Opposite of darkness.

M.q: Starts with M: Large river in Africa, the longest in the world.

N.q: Starts with N: Opposite of yes.

O.q: Starts with O: Chemical element essential for breathing.

P.q: Starts with P: Flat surface on which we write or draw.

Q.q: Starts with Q: A short inquiry.

R.q: Starts with R: Italian city famous for the Colosseum.

S.q: Starts with S: Art of preparing and seasoning food.

T.q: Starts with T: Device that lets people talk at a distance.

U.q: Starts with U: Place of higher education.

V.q: Starts with V: Opposite of defeat.

W.q: Starts with W: Document on the internet.

X.q: Contains X: Device that produces images of the inside of the body.

Y.q: Starts with Y: Yellow citrus fruit.

Z.q: Starts with Z: Striped animal from Africa.

A.q: Someone who has a strong desire to succeed or achieve something.

B.q: A large country in South America known for the Amazon rainforest and Carnival.

C.q: To go up something, like a mountain or a ladder.

D.q: A person who represents their country in foreign affairs.

E.q: Graceful and stylish in appearance or manner.

F.q: A bird of prey known for its speed and sharp eyesight.

G.q: Willing to give more of something, especially money or time, than is strictly necessary or expected.

H.q: A place where sick or injured people receive medical care.

I.q: To fill someone with the urge or ability to do or feel something.

J.q: Feeling upset or angry because you want what someone else has.

K.q: A country or territory ruled by a king or queen.

L.q: To give something to someone temporarily, expecting it to be returned.

M.q: Difficult to understand or explain; full of secrets.

N.q: A country in South Asia, home to part of the Himalayas and Mount Everest.

O.q: To watch something carefully, especially for study or investigation.

P.q: A large wild cat, often black, known for being stealthy and strong.

Q.q: To argue or fight, often in an emotional or noisy way.

R.q: Someone or something you can trust or depend on.

S.q: A person who studies a subject deeply, often in an academic setting.

T.q: Something given, said, or done to show respect or admiration.

U.q: One of a kind; unlike anything else.

V.q: A person who offers to help without being paid; or the act of doing so.

W.q: To speak very quietly so that only someone close can hear.

X.q: A type of radiation used in medicine to look inside the body.

Y.q: Word used to refer to a person or people being spoken or written to. It can be both singular or plural.

Z.q: A device made of two strips with interlocking metal or plastic teeth.

A.q: Empieza por A: País sudamericano cuya capital es Buenos Aires.

B.q: Empieza por B: Bebida caliente que se hace con granos tostados.

C.q: Empieza por C: Satélite natural de la Tierra.

D.q: Empieza por D: Día que sigue al lunes.

E.q: Empieza por E: Parte de una carta donde se anota el destinatario.

F.q: Empieza por F: Animal conocido por su astucia en fábulas.

G.q: Empieza por G: Ciencia que estudia la Tierra.

H.q: Empieza por H: Utensilio para colgar ropa.

I.q: Empieza por I: Opus contrario a lo exterior.

J.q: Empieza por J: Persona que imparte justicia en un tribunal.

K.q: Empieza por K: Arte marcial originaria de Okinawa.

L.q: Empieza por L: Satélite natural de la Tierra.

M.q: Empieza por M: Río que atraviesa Buenos Aires.

N.q: Empieza por N: Neumático en algunos países.

O.q: Empieza por O: Elemento químico esencial para la respiración.

P.q: Empieza por P: Juego televisivo argentino conducido por Iván de Pineda.

R.q: Empieza por R: Ciudad italiana famosa por el Coliseo.

S.q: Empieza por S: Arte de preparar y condimentar alimentos.

T.q: Empieza por T: Aparato que permite hablar a distancia.

U.q: Empieza por U: Lugares de estudio superiores.

V.q: Empieza por V: Contrario de derrota.

W.q: Empieza por W: Documento en internet (en inglés).

X.q: Contiene la X: Aparato para obtener imágenes del interior del cuerpo.
